articles.author: Tony Romm
articles.title: If a government shutdown hits next week, here’s what would happen - The Washington Post
articles.description: A shutdown would unleash real hardship on millions of American families, workers and businesses.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
Comment
Millions of federal employees and active military service members will stop receiving paychecks but many will be forced to report to work anyway.
